description.raw:
Gazebo ABI builds have been failing since we started using gcc6 for ABI builds on xenial in pull request #754. That pull request fixed ign-math5, but broke gazebo. This adds some a variable to allow jobs like gazebo to disable gcc6, but otherwise to use gcc6 for xenial ABI builds if the variable is not set.

* failing build with release-tools default: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64&build=780)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/780/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/780/

* testing this branch [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64&build=781)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/781/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/781/
